title: Switch
description: BOOK 1 in the SWITCH Series!Fifteen-year-old Nova and her father, science fiction writer Dayton Grant, share a special bond forged by their mutual love of all things beyond the normal. When Dayton is killed in a car crash on the bridge near their home, his untimely death gouges a hole in Nova's heart. The world is a dimmer place without him. That is, until she discovers a long hidden family secret – the power to alter past and future events in profound ways, even to cheat death. But she will soon realize that there are risks involved in messing around with fate.M H Rice has created an alternate, and potentially dangerous, reality. In this world, time flows like a river, but not always in the same direction. And you never know who will come back and who will be lost forever...*All books in the SWITCH Series are clean young adult – no graphic language or sex and no drug/alcohol use. They are safe to recommend for young teens!*OTHER BOOKS IN THE SWITCH 2 - FORSAKEN, Book 3 - RETURN.
author: M.H. Rice
